p: Some studies have confirmed that SARS-CoV-2 infects cells through endocytosis via the ACE2 receptor on AT2 alveolar epithelial cells in the lungs [ 78, 79]. At present, the protein structure of the S protein and ACE2 interaction has been solved, providing reliable guidance for vaccine and drug design [ 80]. Aiming at the mutual use of the S protein and ACE2 protein necessary for SARS-CoV-2 to enter host cells, multiple domestic research teams have discovered a variety of potential ACE2-binding agents through molecular docking virtual screening methods and artificial intelligence drug screening methods.
